summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling its resolutions on Burundi, particularly resolution 1545 of 21 May 2004,
Reaffirming commitment to Burundi's sovereignty, independence, territorial integrity, and unity,
Noting ongoing instability in Burundi constituting a threat to regional international peace and security,
Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,
Decides to extend the mandate of the UN Operation in Burundi (ONUB) until 15 January 2006; 
Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
